name: TurboSloth
description:
TurboSloth is a game that I was able to develop during my third year of study within a team of 5 then 3 people. During the realization of the game and the project, I was in particular in charge of the Game Design part of the game, in particular the Level Design as well as all the gameplay and features part. I was also able to participate in the production of the Programming a few times as well as helping with everything related to the Interface.

Notes :

Note that the game is not yet finished and is still in development at this time and therefore not optimally playable.

Credits : 3D Modeling & Animation : DEJEAN Antoine Game Design : CADORET Titouan UI & UX Design : CADORET Titouan Programmation & Integration : GAUDICHON Erwan
